result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Anthony Brown

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in court with attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris.  Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Upon State's motion and pursuant to negotiations, Court ordered Count #1 dismissed and read-in for sentencing purposes.

Court addressed the cash bail on deposit:  Court ordered that the $1,000.00 cash bail on deposit in case# 15CF1647 is to be transferred and held on deposit in case# 15CF1404.

Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court, defendant Michael Anthony Brown not in court, in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

PER THE PERMISSION OF JUDGE DONALD, CLERK ADJOURNED TODAY'S STATUS CONFERENCE OFF THE RECORD.

Matter in court for status of counsel.
Atty. Thomas Harris is now the attorney of record for the defendant.
Case adjourned to 11-04-2015 at 8:30 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Bail/Bond Hearing.

Defendant Michael Anthony Brown not in court, defendant in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

PER THE PERMISSION OF JUDGE DONALD AND HIS UNAVAILABILITY TODAY, CLERK ADJOURNED TODAY'S STATUS CONFERENCE OFF THE RECORD.

This matter was originally scheduled for a status of counsel, however, the parties are unable to proceed.
Public Defender's Office needs more time to appoint.

Case adjourned to 10-05-2015 at 1:30 PM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Adjourned Status of Counsel.

Defendant Michael Anthony Brown not in court, defendant in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

This matter was originally scheduled for a status of counsel, however, the parties are unable to proceed.
Previous defense counsel did not notify the Public Defender's Office that new counsel would be needed today.

Case adjourned to 09-28-2015 at 8:30 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Adjourned Status of Counsel.

Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in court with attorney Robert Lee Taylor.  Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Final Pretrial Conference held.
State's motion to have defense counsel removed because of inherent conflict heard and GRANTED.
Court removed Atty. Taylor as counsel for the defendant.
**Atty. Robert Taylor is now discharged.

Case adjourned to 09-14-2015 at 8:30 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Status of Counsel.
Court CANCELED the 08-26-2015 at 9:00 AM Jury Trial date before Judge Donald's Court.
To Have Defense Counsel Removed Because of Inherent Conflict filed by ADA Michael Thurston on behalf of the State.

Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in court with attorney Robert Lee Taylor.  Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Parties acknowledge receipt of a copy of the doctor's report.  Parties do not challenge the report.  Based on the report, Court finds the defendant is competent to proceed.  Court orders the bail and proceedings reinstated.

On motion of the State, Court orders cases 15cf1404 and 15cf1647 joined for jury trial.   Attorney Taylor has a another jury trial set on the jury date.  Court sets this case as a back-up case.  

Per Chief Judge Directive of 15-10, parties are advised that effective August 3, 2015 this case will be assigned to Branch 02, Judge Joseph Donald, in Room 506 of the Safety Building.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 09:00 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Attorney Robert Lee Taylor in court, defendant Michael Anthony Brown not in court, in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Attorney Taylor has reason to question defendant's competency and asks for a competency evaluation.  Court orders a competency evaluation to be performed by the forensic unit.  Court orders the proceedings suspended.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for July 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point report received and filed./ds

Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in court with attorney Robert Lee Taylor.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point report received and filed./ds

Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in court with attorney Robert Lee Taylor.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 29, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  COURT WILL RETAIN FILE.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

15RM025424  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
05-19-15

Attorney Robert Lee Taylor in court, defendant Michael Anthony Brown not in court, in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Robert Lee Taylor in court, defendant Michael Anthony Brown not in court, in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.

Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in court with attorney Robert Lee Taylor.  Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Konkol, Branch 44. 
Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 44.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with PNS or her family

Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in court with attorney Daryl A Kastenson.  Defendant Michael Anthony Brown in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised due to lower pending case this case is assigned to Judge Konkol, Branch 44. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
